intro: Coinbase cbBTC has centralized authorities that control minting and metadata updates. Users can be censored and have their accounts frozen. Additionally, a centralized admin can upgrade the contracts.
key_findings: mint_authority: Mint authority is a single signer
freeze_authority: Freeze authority is a singler signer
update_authority: Update authority is a single signer

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted
Has freeze authority - accounts can be frozen

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='CTQE6PMesbH4szKR9Nk5moj9WWUr9MVGP734wYX9wy3p', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Mint unlimited tokens', 'Change mint authority to any address', 'Burn tokens from any account', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.freeze_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='DSFAkPhfrSR95J9oq9Sh8rUetbj5vgFmwiSuHw6rAVnz', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Freeze any token account instantly', 'Unfreeze any token account instantly', 'Change freeze authority to any address', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='Aanfr1oYnkNNLTMcL9KHUPv6ZhSV8XwNxc9DJZhBj8u2', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing freeze_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing update_authority - current setup is high risk
